p: The antimicrobial activity (MIC and MBC) of the total EO, α-pinene, and myrcene was determined against all tested strains. Only the MBC values are reported, because the MIC values were difficult to interpret due to turbidity (Table 1). The MBC of the whole EO and of myrcene were ≥ 2048 μg/mL, whereas those of α-pinene ranged from 1024 to > 2048 μg/mL, suggesting that both components contribute to the bactericidal activity of the extract against the L. monocytogenes strains.
